trends: There has been one other sighting in Duanesburg
There were no other sightings in Duanesburg on or around February 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling late at night along Duane Lake road, and i see a light to the west, no identifying lights (just a plane, lights pointed away from my vantage point). It stops, (ok helicopter), then speeds away, extremely fast (What the....!?!?). There is a National Air Guard base nearby, and in the days following the sighting, black choppers had been making low altitude passes over the area, presumably operation out of the ANGB.
